channel.title: **Error running query: Worker exited prematurely: signal 6 (SIGABRT)**
channel.description:
Hi,
I am receiving below error after executing a SQL query:
**Error running query: Worker exited prematurely: signal 6 (SIGABRT)**
We have increased the memory to Standard B4ms (4 vcpus, 16 GiB memory) earlier configuration was:
Op sys: Linux (ubuntu 18.04) Size: Standard B4ms (4 vcpus, 8 GiB memory)
and still we are facing the same issue.
Can anyone please suggest what action needs to be taken here????

item.title: **Error running query: Worker exited prematurely: signal 6 (SIGABRT)**
item.dc:creator: jesse
item.description:
How many rows of data should this query return?

Read full topic

item.title: **Error running query: Worker exited prematurely: signal 6 (SIGABRT)**

item.description:
Hi,

I am receiving below error after executing a SQL query:

Error running query: Worker exited prematurely: signal 6 (SIGABRT)

We have increased the memory to Standard B4ms (4 vcpus, 16 GiB memory) earlier configuration was:

Op sys: Linux (ubuntu 18.04)
Size: Standard B4ms (4 vcpus, 8 GiB memory)

and still we are facing the same issue.

Can anyone please suggest what action needs to be taken here???
